# Circular

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
source("R/setup.R")
```

```{r}
library(papercheck)
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_minimal(base_size = 15))
```

```{r}
badges <- read_csv("data/psychsci-badges.csv") |>
  mutate(open = data | materials | prereg)
```

```{r circular-polar}
ggplot(badges, aes(x = year(date), 
                 y = cited_by, 
                 color = open)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2) +
  scale_y_log10() +
  coord_polar()
```
